mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENCAGOFTRDINF (ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO,ReportFlag) values (#{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CagOfTrdInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ChanTranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TranAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DueTranMon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DetInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCAGOFTRDINF

select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCAGOFTRDINF where ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
